name: Tfosibu Rhenium
description:
Hello Everyone,

I am new to the game development world. Until 2 years ago I had no knowledge whatsoever about programming, but I always loved video games and dreamed of developing one. So 2 years ago I started learning on my own C++ & Unreal Engine 4 and now after a lot of hard work I am proud to present you my first game, TFosibu Rhenium.

TFosibu Rhenium  is a side-scroller-Metroidvania 3D game developed in Unreal Engine 4. 

Story: You are a warrior princess that has gone on a quest to find “the chosen one” that according to a prophecy can save her kingdom from the demonic invasion. In this level you are walking through a deserted temple in a forest. You will be facing numerous enemies, and encounter a lot of traps, as well as a level boss fight. On the way you will be learning special skills such as “Fireball” or “Double jump” that will help you during your mission. The level ends with a boss fight. 

If you like challenges hit the download button and play the demo version!

 Any feedback is much appreciated! If you like the game and want to see it developing further hit the donate button! 

https://trello.com/b/oeSpkoIu/sidescroller-metroidvania-game
Thank you so much and enjoy!
